All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ButtonType
Enum for the types of buttons that can be created
Caffeine
 
CollisionDetector
This class represents the collision detector for the game.
ComponentType
Enum for the types of components that can be created
Config
This record represents the configuration for the game.
Enemy
Abstract class for the enemies in the game Enemy types are
EnemyType
Enum for the enemy type This enum is used to determine the type of enemy when creating them in the EntityManager
Entity
Abstract class for the entities in the game
EntityManager
EntityManager class manages the player and enemies This class should only have one instance
GameManager
Interface for the game manager Game managers update and draw one or more objects, this can be the menu, player, map, etc.
GamePanel
This class represents the main manager for of the game.
GameState
Enum for the different states that the game can be in
GameTime
GameTime class is used to keep track of the time elapsed during the game.
ImageLoader
This class is responsible for loading all the images used in the game.
Item
Item class is a subclass of Tile class.
ItemManager
ItemManager class for the game to manage the items This class is intended to be exclusively used by the MapManager class
KeyHandler
KeyHandler class This is responsible for taking in the user's input and storing it in a EnumMap
Main
Main class for the game
MapLoader
MapLoader class is used to load and create the map from a text file.
MapManager
MapManager class is used to manage the map of the game.
Menu
Class for the Menu, responsible for the main menu, settings menu, and gameover menu.
MenuBanner
 
MenuBG
Represents a component in the menu
MenuButton
Represents a button component in the menu
MenuComponent
Represents a component in the menu
MenuImageLoader
 
MenuKey
Enum for the types of keys that can be pressed in the menu
MenuKeyHandler
Class for handling the key inputs for the Menu Similar to the KeyHandler class, but only for the Menu and play/pause functionality Contains extra keybindings for the Menu
MenuLabel
 
MenuState
Enum for the menu state
Move
Enum for the types of moves that the player can be make
Player
Class for the player entity This class should only have one instance
Raccoon
Class for the racoon enemy
Scoreboard
Scoreboard class for the game
SoundManager
SoundManager class is used to load and play sound effects and background music in the game.
Tile
Tile class is an abstract class that is used to create the different types of tiles in the game.
TileFactory
TileFactory class is used to create Tile objects based on the TileType.
TileType
Enum for the different tile types
Wall
Wall class is a subclass of Tile class.
